name: NSOpenGLContext
desc: An object that represents an OpenGL graphics context, into which all OpenGL calls are rendered.DeprecatedThe OpenGL API is deprecated. Use Metal and MetalKit instead.

items.name: init?(format: NSOpenGLPixelFormat, share: NSOpenGLContext?)
items.desc: Returns an OpenGL context object initialized with the specified pixel format information.

items.name: init?(cglContextObj: CGLContextObj)
items.desc: Initializes and returns an OpenGL context object using an existing CGL context.

items.name: class var current: NSOpenGLContext?
items.desc: Returns the current OpenGL graphics context.

items.name: func makeCurrentContext()
items.desc: Sets the context as the current OpenGL context object.

items.name: func clearDrawable()
items.desc: Disassociates the OpenGL context from its viewport.

items.name: func update()
items.desc: Updates the OpenGL context’s drawable object.

items.name: func flushBuffer()
items.desc: Copies the back buffer to the front buffer of the OpenGL context.

items.name: func setValues(UnsafePointer<GLint>, for: NSOpenGLContext.Parameter)
items.desc: Sets the value of the specified parameter.

items.name: func getValues(UnsafeMutablePointer<GLint>, for: NSOpenGLContext.Parameter)
items.desc: Returns the value of the requested parameter.

items.name: var currentVirtualScreen: GLint
items.desc: Returns the current virtual screen for the OpenGL context.

items.name: var cglContextObj: CGLContextObj?
items.desc: Returns the low-level, platform-specific Core OpenGL (CGL) context object represented by the receiver.

items.name: var pixelFormat: NSOpenGLPixelFormat
items.desc: The pixel format of the OpenGL context.

items.name: static var openGLVersion: (major: GLint, minor: GLint)
